text: amasung makhoina thok-hanba awaba adugidamak makhoida awaba han-gani. Makhoigidamaktadi nungaithokpa haibasi nungthil pobopta makhoigi hakchanggi apambasing adu phangnaba touningbata touba aduni; makhoina makhoigi lounamgi oiba thabaksing aduda nungaithokpaga loinana nakhoigi chaklen aduda makhoina yaoba adu ikainingai oiba amadi mingchat thibani!
